application.description: Name of the Beanstalk Application the version is associated with.

arn.description: ARN assigned by AWS for this Elastic Beanstalk Application.

bucket.description: S3 bucket that contains the Application Version source bundle.

description.description: Short description of the Application Version.

forceDelete.description: On delete, force an Application Version to be deleted when it may be in use by multiple Elastic Beanstalk Environments.

key.description: S3 object that is the Application Version source bundle.

name.description:
Unique name for the this Application Version.

The following arguments are optional:

tags.description: Key-value map of tags for the Elastic Beanstalk Application Version. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: Map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
